title: Pinion Sheer
description: Plain weave linen cloth with supplementary cut cotton warp and weft with eye-lash effect. Pattern of alternating horizontal rows of leaves/feathers with pale yellow stems. Same as 99.1.615.2 but smaller. Ivory plain weave linen cloth with supplementary cut cotton warp and weft with eye-lash effect. Pattern of alternating horizontal rows of leaves/feathers with pale yellow stems. old ivory
